OOC: Hey Airly, since Grounded is  defensive commander, i think i 
should post damage for the Chivtron base, if it is ok with all other 
Chivtron members....

BIC:

Grounded popped out of the ground.  "Hmm, not many left, but it 
seems we aren't even fighting anymore.  But who are these guys 
battling it out."  He then recieved the comm from Lynxiz, but not 
before blasts hit the Chivtron shields.  "Lynxiz, the base is under 
attack, if I open the shields the base could be destroyed by one hit 
of that beast, but if I don't, Trinity..." he left the sentece hanging for 
a moment.  "You have ten seconds to get in the base. Go now"

The shields on the Chivtron base dropped as a blue glow went 
bright then out.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Seekker didn't have the same thoughts of either Lokk or Axis.  
First, he never checked his ammo, second, he didn't care who 
knew where he was.  

"Wheee haaaaa hahaaaa whooooo" he yelled jumping from off the 
pod Axis was behind pulling his trigger shooting out 20 shots from 
each minigun (40 total) before all he got was a click click click.  He 
immediatly stopped running at Gemini.  "ummm,  i've been turned 
into a cow, may i go home" he said looking confusedly at his 
miniguns.  Swinging them under his arms they latched on his back 
as the small bot began running at gemini again, top speed.  
"IIIICCCCEEE CRRREEEEAAAMMMM" he yelled out as he leaped 
for one of gemini's heads.
